title: Enter the House and Open the Door
description: Open the door and enter the house.

title: Turn on the TV
description: Locate the remote control and press the power button to turn on the TV.

title: Turn on the Lights
description: Go to the light switch and turn on all the lights in the designated area.

title: Check the Refrigerator
description: Walk to the refrigerator and open it to check for food.
